summary:
Hufflepuff: okay Slytherin, you have to make sure that I don't wake up in the middle of my dream. Hypnotize me.
Slytherin: okay,...
body:
Hufflepuff: okay Slytherin, you have to make sure that I don’t wake up in the middle of my dream. Hypnotize me.

Slytherin: okay, now focus on my watch.

Gryffindor: hey! That’s my watch!

Slytherin: okay dude, this is about puff, get over yourself.

title: Lost and Found
body:

by Elemtee

James and Lily are dead, and Sirius, who is raising Harry, packs up their lives and moves to the other side of the world in an attempt to outrun his ghosts. Little does he know, the biggest ghost of all is right under his nose

summary:
Step by step guide on how to try too hard
Step 1: Comment on the surroundings. It’s very interesting and not boring at all.
Step...
body:
Awkward flirting with Penny part 3

Step by step guide on how to try too hard

Step 1: Comment on the surroundings. It’s very interesting and not boring at all.

Step 2: Tell your object of desire your joke is funny. Preferably right before you deliver the joke.

Step 3: When all fail, always try talking about Quidditch.

Step 4: Drop a bombshell in the middle of a casual conversation and get all serious.

summary: Ginny: James, don’t you have something to say to your brother? James to Albus: I’m sorry I flicked flour in your face. Ginny:...
body:
Ginny: James, don’t you have something to say to your brother?

James to Albus: I’m sorry I flicked flour in your face.

Ginny: Albus?

Albus: I’m sorry I’m your brother.

blog.name: dorothyhatesyou

title: I’ll Do Art For You!
body:
Hey, guys! So, I know I don’t have a very large follower count, but if one of my more popular followers could boost this for me, I’d be eternally grateful.

So, I am very poor. That’s pretty much okay with me most of the time- my mom makes sure we don’t starve, and we sometimes get non-necessities.

I have applied for almost every job in my town, which is a very limited amount of jobs. I have called them, which has given me multiple anxiety attacks, and done everything in my power to make sure they see my application and want to hire me. However, I have obviously not been hired anywhere.

Another problem, probably the biggest one, is that I owe $150 to the government for getting t-boned by an SUV in my little stationwagon. Since I wasn’t able to pay the fee in time, my license has been revoked and I won’t be allowed to drive until I get the money paid in full.

So, I’ve decided to commission my art! If you want me to draw you an OC, or an existing character in a fandom, I would be happy to for a small fee!

For the head/bust: $2

For the full body: $5

For a full image (full body and background): $7

Color isn’t extra! Just tell me what you prefer!

Here is my PayPal link: PayPal.Me/dorothyhatesyou

Just message me and tell me what you would like and we can work it out!

Here are some examples of my art. These are all mostly cartoon-ish, but I am able to do a more realistic image- it would just take a tad longer! +these were all for myself, so I wasn’t as careful shading in as I could have been. I would make everything as solid as you like!

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: Hey whiny Potterheads: get this into your thick skulls. Dumbledore will be gay in the movie and everyone behind the project...
body: Hey whiny Potterheads: get this into your thick skulls. Dumbledore will be gay in the movie and everyone behind the project knows it. The audience will know it through the art of subtlety instead of just telling it to you to your face because that’s how good storytelling works. But, sadly, I don’t think the internet understands how to be subtle in any way.

reblog.comment: Hey whiny Potterheads: get this into your thick skulls. Dumbledore will be gay in the movie and everyone behind the project knows it. The audience will know it through the art of subtlety instead of just telling it to you to your face because that’s how good storytelling works. But, sadly, I don’t think the internet understands how to be subtle in any way.

summary: Shout-out to Andromeda Tonks for successfully severing ties from her abusive family, marrying for love, and raising a...
body: Shout-out to Andromeda Tonks for successfully severing ties from her abusive family, marrying for love, and raising a self-assured bad-ass daughter who willingly fought and gave her life to stop the kind of hate and suppression that her mother fled.

title: STORY: The Great Snake Debate
body:
STORY: The Great Snake Debate

“I don’t understand your Harry Potter reference,” complains the Snake.

“That’s because you’re too old,” I say. “When I was reading Harry Potter, you were starting as a doorman at Bloody Mary’s.”

“How typical,” hisses the snake. “You get to sit on the couch while I slave away doing all the hard work.”

“It’s not my fault you’re ten years older than me.”

“Don’t say that,” he says. “You’re making me…

View On WordPress

Less of a blog, more of a stash. A podstash, if you will.
The only reason this is a Tumblr and not a giant list is so you can browse by mood/theme/interest! Head to the menu, top left, stat!

summary: What if we read the books we love as if they were sacred texts? That's what the two hosts of Harry Potter and the Sacred Text...
caption: What if we read the books we love as if they were sacred texts? That’s what the two hosts of Harry Potter and the Sacred Text set out to do. In this odd and delightful podcast the hosts from, who are affiliated with Harvard Divinity, read the Harry Potter books chapter by chapter. They treat them with all the love and attention to detail usually reserved for reading religious texts. HP&TST’s motto is “because reading fiction doesn’t help us escape the world, it helps us live in it”. It’s a calming, fun, life-affirming listen. No need to be a passionate Potterhead – passing affection is good enough to make this enjoyable.

No need to be a passionate Potterhead – passing affection is good enough to make this enjoyable.

summary: hey, do u have any fc suggestions for james potter that aren’t aaron johnson? thanks!
question: hey, do u have any fc suggestions for james potter that aren’t aaron johnson? thanks!
answer:
Hi there!

You would say: Joe Keery, Timothee Chalamet, Douglas Booth, Charlie Rowe, Maxence Danet-Fauvel.

Hope it helps c:

Hope it helps c:

Hi there!

You would say: Joe Keery, Timothee Chalamet, Douglas Booth, Charlie Rowe, Maxence Danet-Fauvel.

Hope it helps c:

Hi there!

blog.name: chloe-skywalker
blog.title: Writer
blog.description: Chloe / 18 / Cali / Writer / Ask & Requests Always Open / Imagines / Ships / Preferences / Headcanons / My Masterlist Has All TV & Movie Characters I Write For / If Something Isn't There Just Ask / { https://chloe-skywalker.tumblr.com/post/163977040588/masterlist }

title: To My Followers (Please Read)
body:
So thank you to all my new followers and thank you to the old ones love you all.

Since my recent imagines have all been emptied from my queue you have seen some new things I’ll be writing for such as

~ American Horror Story

I don’t have to many Tate ones in mind, and so far I feel like when watching the shows he's the only one that I could really write for. But there will be a few more of him.

~ Harry Potter (characters)

As for Harry Potter. I have A LOT planned for Harry Potter characters in the future. I have: x Daughter reader, x Sister reader, x Reader, etc… So far the characters I have that would be in a relationship with the reader planned are Cedric Diggory and Draco Malfoy. I am trying to think of some Harry Potter himself being with the reader ideas but if you have any go ahead and send then in.

~ Avengers

I have started this. I have some characters already listed on my masterlist but that will grow. I have: x sister reader, x daughter reader, x reader, etc… Characters that I have ideas for: Bucky, Steve, Peter Parker, Tony, Clint, Nat / Blackwidow, etc…

~ The Flash

There will be more of these, but I don't have that many ideas at the moment

~ DC’s Legends Of Tomorrow

There will be more of these but again not to many at the moment 

~ The Vampire Diaries

There will defiantly be more of these soon. Lots of requests. And I’m hoping to write more Kai, Love Him! And more Original vampire(s) Imagines, not  set in The Originals time period

~ X Men

I have A Lot of these planned, A Lot

~ Gilmore Girls

Probably very soon get some more ideas.

~ Jokers daughter 

I am up for doing more imagines for that they are always fun but I need more ideas for them.

~ Teen Wolf

Of course, there are a lot more planned!

# To all the people who have sent in requests. I’m so super very sorry they are not done yet. They should be done soon I hope. Some I did almost finish and then my google docs kept deleting my stuff, which really really sucks. Then I was a senior in high school and I had a ton of school work, then my school’s online site decided to delete my account thinking I didn’t go there anymore so then I couldn’t do my work for 3 weeks so I had A LOT of catching up to do. Then prom, grad night, graduation. So I have not had time to get to a lot of requests. What I have written you’ll notice doesn’t have the “Requested:” on them because I thought of them myself and wrote them when I had time or thought of the idea. I have one full book and I had to buy a new book,(well journals) I write down all my ideas and requests in there so I can always go back and look through and see what I want to write. I promise your requests will get done soon! I promise I’m not blowing you off.

And I have lots of ideas that I’m gonna write that I have written down from myself that I’m sure you guys will love.

Please give feedback on imagines, and on this post and please request, and visit my Masterlist - I will be rearranging my masterlist soon because I feel like its to busy
